Vigilance
Poisonous 2 [i](Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“You may fear the charging enemy, but the most dangerous predator waits to strike.”
—Althea Elmstone, biologist[/i]
